sentences.en: A botanist can differentiate varieties of plants.
sentences.cn: 植物学家能区分各种不同的植物.

sentences.en: Along with English botanist Joseph Hooker, Lyell was one of a small handful of people Darwin had shown early drafts of his own work on natural selection.
sentences.cn: 同英国植物学家约瑟夫·胡克一样，莱尔是少数了解达尔文在自然选择学说方面研究的早期草稿的人之一。

sentences.en: And we have a botanist named Fred Coville to thank.
sentences.cn: 这里我们应该感谢植物学家弗雷德康维尔。

sentences.en: De Bary , Heinrich Anton ( 1831 - 88 ) German botanist.
For example, I met a distinguished botanist a dinner party given a New York book publisher.
sentences.cn: 我最近在纽约出版商[格林伯]的一次宴会上,遇到一位著名的植物学家.

sentences.en: Forty - five years on, the French botanist's gardens have grown massive in scale.
sentences.cn: 四十五年过去, 这法国植物学家的花园规模更大.

sentences.en: Forty-five years on, the French botanist's gardens have grown massive in scale.
sentences.cn: 四十五年过去，这法国植物学家的花园规模更大。

sentences.en: Greece is said to be a botanist's dream.
sentences.cn: 据说希腊是植物学家梦寐以求的地方。

sentences.en: The botanist introduced a new species of plant to the region.
sentences.cn: 那位植物学家向该地区引入了一种新植物.

sentences.en: The botanist met with many rare plants.
sentences.cn: 这个植物学家偶然发现了许多稀有植物.

sentences.en: There's enough variety here to make any [ botanist ] [ drool ] .
sentences.cn: 这里的植物多样性足以让每个植物学家 喜出望外.

sentences.en: This strange phenomenon is rare in nature, has a botanist can not find the reasons.
sentences.cn: 这种奇异的现象在自然界实属罕见, 至今植物学家找不出生成的原因.

sentences.en: This was first observed by the botanist Brown.
sentences.cn: 首先观察到这个现象的是植物学家布朗.

words.tran_cn: 调查研究植物生长情况

trans.tran_cn: 植物学家，研究植物的人
trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to make scientific studies of wild plants
